input_info.scene_type: medium shot (frames a subject from the waist up, capturing expressions and some background context)

scene_description: The scene takes place inside a brightly lit high school music room. The walls are painted a cheerful light blue with posters of famous rock bands and colorful music notes decorating the space. Sunlight streams in through wide windows, making the instruments glimmer slightly. There’s a buzz of excitement in the air, like right before a performance, and the camera captures the warmth and energy of friends practicing together.
items: A teenage boy holding a red electric guitar, wearing a black T-shirt with a lightning bolt on it, smiling confidently while strumming. He is standing slightly to the left of center, facing forward.

A teenage girl with long brown hair tied in a ponytail, wearing a denim jacket over a white shirt, sitting on a wooden stool while holding a microphone in both hands. She is leaning slightly forward as if ready to sing.
A boy with curly hair wearing a green hoodie, seated behind a drum set with sticks raised in mid-air, looking focused as he prepares to hit the drums.
A girl in glasses wearing a plaid skirt and yellow sweater, holding a notebook with lyrics written inside. She is looking toward the singer with an encouraging smile.
A shiny black amplifier positioned on the floor near the guitar player, angled slightly toward the camera.
A set of music stands in the background, some holding sheets of paper with handwritten notes.
A tall floor lamp with a golden glow standing near the back wall, adding extra warmth to the scene.
A poster of a famous rock band on the wall in the background, slightly tilted as if well-used.
A small group of colorful beanbag chairs scattered in the corner of the room, showing a relaxed hangout area.
A window with white curtains slightly swaying, letting sunlight and a faint breeze into the room.

questions.question: What instrument is the boy in the black T-shirt playing?
Where are the beanbag chairs located?
options: In the corner of the room
On top of the drum set
questions.answer: In the corner of the room

questions.question: What color is the boy’s hoodie at the drums?
Why is the girl with glasses holding a notebook?
What is hanging on the wall in the background?
options: A poster of a rock band
questions.answer: A poster of a rock band

questions.question: Which item is giving off a golden glow?
What is the girl with the ponytail wearing?
Who looks focused while holding drumsticks?
options: The boy in the green hoodie
questions.answer: The boy in the green hoodie

questions.question: What can be seen moving slightly by the window?
